brainly_data.question: Write a python function that computes the area of an equilateral triangle given the length of one of its sides. search for a mathematical formula that specifies this relation and translate that formula into python. hint: the desired formula involves taking a square root. remember that you compute a square root of a number in python by raising that number to the 0.5 power using the ** operator.
brainly_data.subject: Mathematics

all_answers.question: Write a python function that computes the area of an equilateral triangle given the length of one of its sides. search for a mathematical formula that specifies this relation and translate that formula into python. hint: the desired formula involves taking a square root. remember that you compute a square root of a number in python by raising that number to the 0.5 power using the ** operator.
all_answers.subject: Mathematics
all_answers.text: Area = (√3)/4 * s² (S = Any side of the Equilateral Triangle)
